title: How to Request an Uber for a Family Member, Friend, or Stranger

steps.title: Open the Uber app.
steps.content: Open the Uber app. If you're not automatically signed in, enter your login information.

steps.title: Tap Where to?.
steps.content: Tap Where to? . It's next to the magnifying glass icon at the top of the page.

steps.title: Tap For Me.
steps.content: Tap For Me . It's the second drop-down menu at the top of the page.

steps.title: Tap Add new contact.
steps.content: Tap Add new contact . It's the second option in the menu.

steps.title: Enter your friend's phone number and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter your friend's phone number and tap Next . You can select their number from your contacts list or you can enter their number in the field at the top of the page. Then tap Next at the bottom of the page.

steps.title: Enter the person's name and tap Add rider.
steps.content: Enter the person's name and tap Add rider . Enter the first and last name of the person for whom you are ordering an Uber. This is the name the driver will see. Then tap Add rider at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Make sure the person is selected and tap Done.
steps.content: Make sure the person is selected and tap Done . Ensure the radio option next to the rider's name is selected and tap Done at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Enter a pick-up location.
steps.content: Enter a pick-up location. To do so, tap the field next to the circle dot at the top of the page. Then enter the address that the person will be waiting at.

steps.title: Enter the destination the person needs to get to.
steps.content: Enter the destination the person needs to get to. To do so, tap the field below the pick-up address and enter the address the person is traveling to.

steps.title: Select a ride.
steps.content: Select a ride. This could be an UberX, UberXL, Comfort, or any other available choice. The price will be listed next to each ride type. Tap the type of ride you want to choose and then tap the black button at the bottom of the screen. If you want to change your payment method. Tap your credit cart at the bottom of the screen. Select another payment method or tap Add payment method at the bottom of the screen and follow the prompts to add a payment method.

steps.title: Tap Confirm Pickup.
steps.content: Tap Confirm Pickup . It's the black button at the bottom of the screen. This confirms the pickup. The person will receive a text message with information about the driver, including their name, ETA, license plate number, and the type of car they are driving.

steps.title: Open the Uber app.
steps.content: Open the Uber app. You can use the Uber app to add family members to your account . Then your family members can order an Uber using a shared account.

steps.title: Tap Account.
steps.content: Tap Account . It's in the lower-right corner. It has an icon that resembles a silhouette.

steps.title: Tap Family and teens.
steps.content: Tap Family and teens . It's the first option below the large button options at the top of the account menu. It's next to an icon that resembles a group of people.

steps.title: Tap Add new member.
steps.content: Tap Add new member . It's the first option at the top of the menu.

steps.title: Tap Invite family.
steps.content: Tap Invite family . It's the black button at the bottom of the page.

steps.title: Select if they are an adult or teen.
steps.content: Select if they are an adult or teen. If the person is over 18 years of age, tap the radio option next to "Adult." If the person is between the ages of 13 to 17, tap the radio option next to "Teen." Then tap Continue at the bottom of the page.

steps.title: Tap Choose contact.
steps.content: Tap Choose contact . If you are adding a teen, you will be given some information about teen accounts. Tap Choose contact at the bottom of the screen to continue.

steps.title: Enter your family member's phone number.
steps.content: Enter your family member's phone number. You can either tap their name in your contacts list, or you can enter their number at the top of the page.

steps.title: Enter their contact information.
steps.content: Enter their contact information. Make sure you enter their first and last name, their phone number, and date of birth. Then tap Save at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Tap the checkbox to agree to the terms of use.
steps.content: Tap the checkbox to agree to the terms of use. It's at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Send Invite.
steps.content: Tap Send Invite . It's the black button at the bottom of the screen. Your family member will receive an invitation to download the app and set up their own account. You can add up to five family members to your account. Uber teen accounts allows teens to order their own Ubers with a shared family account. You will be able to track them in real-time and put a spending limit on their account. Furthermore, only the highest-rated drivers are allowed to drive teens. Audio recordings of the trip are also available. [1] X Research source
